title: T3 to stay until Wipha's threat drops further
news_content:
The Strong Wind Signal No. 3 is expected to remain in force for some time until the threat posed by Typhoon Wipha is further reduced, the Observatory said on Sunday. 

The forecaster said Wipha had moved further away from Hong Kong and local winds were expected to weaken as it issued the No. 3 alert at 7.40pm. But it warned that strong winds still prevailed over many places. 

"The Strong Wind Signal No. 3 is expected to remain in force for some time," the Observatory said. 

"When the threat posed to Hong Kong by Wipha is further reduced, the Observatory will issue the Standby Signal No. 1 or replace the Tropical Cyclone Warning Signal by the Strong Monsoon Signal."

The Drainage Services Department confirmed six cases of flooding in Kowloon and the New Territories, and deployed 90 emergency response teams to conduct inspection and handle cases. 

There were more than 470 reports of fallen trees in total. 

The Hospital Authority said as of 4pm, 26 people had sought medical treatment at the accident and emergency departments at public hospitals.

With the weather starting to stabilise, public transport services gradually resumed across town. 

All MTR rail lines have started running, while daytime routes of Kowloon Motor Bus and Citybus began resuming from 8pm. 

People could start taking cross-harbour ferries again as early as 9pm, and trips to and from outlying islands would resume shortly after.

title: 風暴消息｜龍翔道一度水浸　黃大仙站感應器曾亮起車站無受影響
news_content:
韋帕吹襲本港期間，港鐵黃大仙站曾出現水浸。港鐵車務營運及本地鐵路總管李婉玲表示，較早時龍翔道、黃大仙港鐵站A出口曾經有感應器亮起，人員按程序加裝防洪閘，車站無受影響，水退後，A出口已重開。

網上片段所見，黃大仙站對開的龍翔道一度水浸，水深一度去到行人的小腿位置，途經的汽車亦要慢駛。

渠務署表示，截至下午6時，錄得6宗確認的水浸個案，除了黃大仙龍翔道近黃大仙港鐵站，亦有黃大仙龍翔道近牛池灣村、黃大仙竹園道、大埔林錦公路，以及西貢清水灣道。經渠務署與路政署、警方及消防處努力下，除了黃大仙竹園道個案外，其餘5宗已處理好。署方派出90隊緊急應變隊伍巡查和處理水浸個案，又呼籲市民切勿接近河道。

title: 風暴消息｜天文台料三號強風信號將維持一段時間
news_content:
天文台在晚上7時40分改發三號強風信號。

天文台表示，隨著韋帕進一步遠離香港並減弱，本地普遍風力亦逐漸減弱，但多處地區仍然吹強風，西南部及高地間中吹烈風，預料三號強風信號會維持一段時間。

天文台又說，當韋帕對本港的威脅進一步減低時，天文台會改發一號戒備信號，或以強烈季候風信號取代熱帶氣旋警告信號。

title: 風暴消息｜中環來往愉景灣及珀麗灣的渡輪服務將陸續恢復
news_content:

至於珀麗灣客運有限公司則表示，珀麗灣往返中環的航線、青衣巴士線、葵芳巴士線及機場巴士線，均在今晚分階段恢復。而通宵中環巴士線會正常服務；荃灣往來珀麗灣航線則在明早恢復。

新大嶼山巴士表示，多條路線陸續恢復正常班次，包括37M、38、39M、B4、B6、1號線、3M號線、11號線、34號線、37H號線及A35號線。

title: NHK推算日本執政聯盟很大機會未能保住參議院過半議席
news_content:
日本參議院選舉投票於本港時間晚上7時結束。日本放送協會( NHK)推算，執政聯盟很大機會未能保住過半數議席。

今次選舉會改選參議院半數議席，即124席，另外有一個補選議席。

根據推算，執政自民黨會贏得27至41席，盟友公明黨會有5至12席。連同未有改選的75席，兩黨在參議院的議席很大機會未能過半。

在野黨方面，NHK推算立憲民主黨可贏得18至30席；日本維新會預計可贏得6至9席；國民民主黨會有16席；主張日本人優先的參政黨議席，有望由1席增加至10至22席。

title: 風暴消息｜天文台稱韋帕是繼前年蘇拉後須發出十號信號的熱帶氣旋
news_content:
天文台表示，預料韋帕會在明日橫過廣東西部沿岸一帶並移向北部灣。受其相關的雨帶影響，未來兩三日廣東沿岸仍有驟雨及狂風雷暴。本港明日雨勢有時頗大，呼籲市民外出前留意天文台最新天氣消息。

天文台今早一度先後發出九號烈風或暴風風力增強信號及十號颶風信號，天文台解釋，韋帕在香港天文台以南約50公里左右掠過，本港多處地區包括橫瀾島、長洲、青洲、大老山及昂坪均曾受颶風影響。上一個需要發出十號信號的熱帶氣旋為2023年的蘇拉，雖然韋帕的強度不及超強颱風蘇拉，但在兩者襲港期間，本港整體風力相約。

天文台又說，受韋帕相關的雨帶影響，本港今日有頻密狂風大驟雨，天文台下午曾經發出紅色暴雨警告信號。由午夜至下午4時，多處地區錄得超過70毫米雨量，當中黃大仙及新界部分地區更錄得超過140毫米。

而受到風暴潮影響，大埔滘的水位今早曾上升至海圖基準面以上3米左右，亦有部分沿岸低窪地區出現輕微水浸。

title: 風暴消息｜民政事務總署稱民政處及關愛隊為居民提供適切支援
news_content:
民政事務總署表示，在颱風韋帕襲港期間，多區都有突發情況，各區民政處人員、關愛隊隊員和義工，以及區議員都有出動協助市民處理，民政總署於各區共開放34個臨時庇護中心，目前為止共有超過250人入住。

民政事務總署在社交專頁表示，黃大仙翠竹花園有長者早上發現廁所和廚房窗戶，因大風大雨大量漏水入屋導致水浸，長者無法處理，黃大仙翠竹及鵬程關愛隊即時安排住在同一大廈的義工到場協助。

另外，大埔區關愛隊接獲市民求助，指其年邁母親居住的單位，房間窗戶飛脫跌到街上，另外兩隻窗亦無法關上。關愛隊成員與區議員隨即跟進，於10號信號下帶齊工具到單位，確認住戶安全，並幫忙圍封窗框。

各區民政處會繼續時刻留意區內情況，與其他政府部門保持緊密聯繫，盡力為居民提供適切支援。

title: 風暴消息｜港鐵：所有鐵路綫已恢復全綫服務
news_content:
港鐵表示，所有鐵路綫已恢復全綫列車服務，輕鐵大部分路綫亦恢復服務。至於輕鐵614及615綫，以及港鐵巴士仍暫停服務。

多條路綫恢復10分鐘一班車，包括荃灣綫、觀塘綫、港島綫、南港島綫、將軍澳綫北角站至寶琳站、東涌綫、機場快綫、屯馬綫、東鐵綫金鐘站至羅湖站。

至於將軍澳綫調景嶺站至康城站大約15分鐘一班車。迪士尼綫20分鐘一班車。東鐵綫金鐘站至落馬洲站平均20分鐘一班車。

港鐵車務營運及本地鐵路總管李婉玲表示，在九號信號發出後，有盡量安排車站維持開放，照顧約1000名行程受影響的乘客，包括派發水、熱飲、乾糧、毛氈和設置充電站等。而在天文台改發八號信號後，亦隨即派出工程車和維修團隊巡查露天路段，包括移除路軌上的障礙物。暫無發現設備出現嚴重損壞的情況。

title: Airport to work through the night to ease backlog
news_content:
Airport bosses have vowed to work round-the-clock to make flight arrangements and assist travellers, as the Hong Kong International Airport is expected to remain busy throughout the night and the next day amid a backlog. 

Chris Au Young, the Airport Authority's general manager of terminal and passenger experience, said about 400 flights that had been rescheduled would either depart or arrive the SAR on Sunday as Typhoon Wipha moves away from the city.

"We have been spoken with the Civil Aviation Department and various airlines on arranging flights overnight and deploying additional staff to handle the departure procedures for passengers. All 27 of our security checkpoints at departure will be fully operational to serve passengers overnight," he said. 

"Due to the continued inclement weather, we expect the resumption of flights to continue until Monday evening."

The authority also aimed to resume all 500 cancelled flights, affecting about 100,000 passengers, in two to three days, Au Young added.

title: 風暴消息｜韋帕吹襲期間交通大受影響　港鐵料稍後恢復露天段行車
news_content:
風暴「韋帕」襲港期間，除了航空，海陸交通亦大受影響。港鐵表示，預計黃昏較後時間，分階段恢復包括露天段列車的全線行車，而荃灣綫、觀塘綫、港島綫、迪士尼綫及機場快綫等，與及輕鐵大部分路綫已恢復列車服務。

九巴及龍運、城巴、新大嶼山巴士部分路線陸續恢復有限度服務。九巴表示，日間路線預計最快晚上8時起恢復服務。

title: 風暴消息｜運輸署督導5支的士車隊落波後接載乘客往來機場
news_content:
運輸署表示，已督導全部5支的士車隊稍後在改發三號信號後，於道路安全和可行情況下，加派車隊的士來往市區酒店和機場，分別接載離港和抵港乘客，發揮優質的士服務的優勢，協助疏導往返機場的客流。署方亦已聯絡的士業界，加強來往機場的服務。

運輸署在社交專頁說，已檢視各主要幹道、連接巴士廠和鐵路站的道路，以及沒有替代路線地點的連接道路清單，務求快捷分辨出須優先清理水浸和路面障礙物的位置，便利相關部門協調和調撥資源以執行清理工作，盡快開通阻塞道路，盡早恢復公交服務，盡量減低對市民出行的影響 。

title: 丘應樺指外商對本港仍有信心
news_content:
商務及經濟發展局局長丘應樺在一個電台節目表示，本屆政府已經努力扭轉了香港整體營商情況，投資推廣署引入企業的數目及投資額已經超標。即使在美國發動關稅戰下，很多國家看到香港的機遇，海外企業對本港仍然有信心。

另外，丘應樺建議本地零售業、及飲食業界，要識變、應變及求變，他相信電商貿易發展，有助零售業界找到營商的新出路。

title: 陳茂波指創科產業發展藍圖紮實　料創科提供更多元優質事業發展
news_content: 財政司司長陳茂波發表網誌，他表示科技創新與青年人才的培育，關係密不可分。從大力支持基礎研究，到促進成果轉化；從培育本地初創，到吸引全球前沿科企落戶等，本港創科產業發展已有一張紮實藍圖，他相信，創科亦將為年青人提供更多元、優質的事業發展機會。

title: 澳門一度發出十號風球　珠海等城市「五停」

中央氣象台說，廣東西南部、海南島北部等地，局部地區會有特大暴雨，雨量介乎250至350毫米。

title: T3 signal to be issued at 7.40pm
news_content:
The Observatory on Sunday said it would downgrade the typhoon warning signal for Wipha to Strong Wind Signal No. 3 at 7.40pm, as local winds weakened progressively. 

"Wipha is moving further away from Hong Kong. However, gale to storm force southeasterly winds are still affecting parts of the territory occasionally," the forecaster said.

"With local winds weakening progressively, the Observatory will issue the Strong Wind Signal No. 3 at 7.40pm."

The No. 8 storm signal took effect at 4.10pm, replacing the No. 10 warning which was in force for almost seven hours.

title: 東京山手線列車有外置充電器起火　4人傷
news_content:
日本東京山手線列車上有外置充電器起火，造成4人受傷。

日本放送協會報道，事發在當地下午約4時，一列山手線內環線列車駛到新宿至新大久保站之間時，車廂突然冒煙，部分乘客下車沿路軌走到新大久保站，一名男乘客則用車上的滅火筒將起火的外置充電器撲熄。

報道說，30多歲的女事主當時正用外置充電器為手提電話充電，她手部燒傷，另外有3名乘客受輕傷。

受事故影響，山手線全線列車一度暫停運行，外環線在當地下午5時左右恢復運行，內環線在6時恢復。

有寧波旅客原定乘搭晚上7時許的航班離港，但航班延遲到明早6時，決定留在機場等候。她說昨日得知消息後，已隨即改買火車票，其後再被取消，退票及改票4至5次，感到無奈。

title: MTR to resume full services as storm weakens
news_content:
The MTR said on Sunday afternoon that train services will begin a phased resumption, following the downgrade of Typhoon Wipha to a No. 8 Southeast Gale or Storm Signal.

The railway operator said that full restoration will take time, particularly for open sections, as crews need to clear debris from tracks under safe circumstances.

Services on exposed and open-air sections are suspended once the No. 9 Signal is issued.

The company said certain lines with extensive open sections – such as the East Rail Line, Tuen Ma Line, Tung Chung Line and Airport Express – will take longer for safety checks and preparation, estimated at two to three hours. 

It said that MTR bus services will remain suspended.

title: T8 in effect as Typhoon Wipha moves away
news_content:
The No. 8 storm signal was in force at 4.10pm on Sunday as Typhoon Wipha moved away from the SAR.

The No. 8 Southeast Gale or Storm Signal replaced the Hurricane Signal No. 10, which was in effect for nearly seven hours.

While the worst winds have passed, the Observatory cautioned that gales persist, with mean wind speeds expected to reach 63 kilometres per hour or more, lasting for some time.

Meanwhile, the Observatory issued the red rainstorm warning at 3.45pm.

"Heavy rain is affecting the northern part of the New Territories, especially in Pat Heung and Kam Tin, San Tin and Ngau Tam Mei areas. More than 110 millimetres of rainfall have been recorded in the past three hours," it said.

Residents in those areas were urged to take necessary precautions to avoid possible flood damage.

The Hospital Authority said as of 2pm, 13 males and eight females had sought medical treatment at the accident and emergency departments at public hospitals.

Separately, authorities received a total of 363 reports of fallen trees.

The Labour Department said employers and contractors should avoid assigning employees to carry out electrical work or handle electrical plant at places affected by rainstorms. 

The department added that suitable safety measures should be adopted to protect the safety of their employees. 

Additionally, the Education Bureau announced that evening school classes on Sunday will be suspended.

title: Education key to innovation and talent development: FS
news_content:
Financial Secretary Paul Chan said technological innovation and youth talent development are intrinsically linked, with education playing a key role in the relationship.

Writing in his weekly blog, Chan said he invited more than a dozen elementary school students to explore a newly launched "Hong Kong Tech Showcase" pop-up zone at the ongoing book fair.

The exhibition features cutting-edge innovations across education, health, sports and food sectors.

The finance chief said the goal was to ignite students' curiosity by giving them firsthand experience with technology development and application, potentially opening doors to deeper scientific and technological learning.

"In this era of rapid technological changes, talent must possess keen intuition and curiosity, the ability to quickly understand new things and a strong commitment to continuous learning and research," he said. 

"More importantly, they must have the courage to try, the willingness to innovate and the resilience to face failure."

Chan also said that he recently spoke with a group of young people at Science Park, where representatives from startups highlighted several factors that attract them to pursue innovation and technology in Hong Kong. 

These include the city's investment in technological development, support for startups, and a diverse and inclusive environment that attracts global talent and strong connections to the Greater Bay Area market and production base.

"This year, the internship programme at Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks received a record of more than 5,000 applications. Ultimately, only 450 people were accepted. Among them, two-thirds of the interns come from the top 50 universities in the world, including leading institutions in Europe and the United States, while nearly 30 percent are international students," he said. 

"This clearly reflects the international attractiveness of Hong Kong's innovation and technology ecosystem."

The finance chief added that the expanding tech sector will provide Hong Kong’s youth with diverse, high-quality career pathways, empowering them to realise their ambitions and achieve their dreams.

Wipha starts to move away from Hong Kong
news_content:
The Observatory said the Hurricane Signal No. 10 is expected to remain in force until at least 3pm on Sunday, as Typhoon Wipha starts to move away from Hong Kong. 

It said it would then consider issuing the Gale or Storm Signal No. 8 depending on local winds. 

"Wipha has started to depart from Hong Kong, but its associated hurricane force winds are still affecting the southwestern part of the territory," it said.

"Members of the public should stay on high alert, stay where they are sheltered and beware of destructive winds."

So far, there have been no reports of flooding or landslides but the Hospital Authority said seven males and seven females have sought medical treatment at the Accident and Emergency. 

As of noon, the Government's 1823 Call Centre and the Fire Services Department said they had received a total of 240 reports of fallen trees.

Earlier, the Home Affairs Department opened 34 temporary shelters with over 200 people seeking refuge. 

The last time the Observatory issued a Hurricane Signal No. 10 was the Super Typhoon Saola in September 2023, which lasted for more than 7 hours.

港鐵說，維修團隊已經候命，當改發較低信號和在安全情況下，團隊會出動檢查露天段和相關設施，在安全情況下盡快回復服務。不過，部分綫路如東鐵綫、屯馬綫、東涌綫和機場快綫有較長露天段，或需額外準備時間。

title: 風暴消息｜船隻據報曾撞向招商局碼頭　消防到場以纜繩將船固定
news_content:
十號颶風信號現正生效，本港多處海面有巨浪。其中在堅尼地城海旁對出海面，一艘船據報曾撞向招商局碼頭，消防輪下午近1時，將涉事船隻推回至碼頭適當位置，多名消防人員再用纜繩將船固定在纜樁。

警方上午約10時，接獲多人報案指該船隻在屋苑泓都對開海面飄浮，被風吹至靠近招商局碼頭，事件中沒有人受傷。

title: 中國與越南將舉行攜手同行﹣2025陸軍聯合訓練
news_content:
中國與越南本月中下旬將在廣西舉行攜手同行﹣2025陸軍聯合訓練。

央視報道，今次是中越雙方首次開展陸軍聯訓，以邊境地區聯合執勤訓練為主題，加強邊境執勤經驗互學互鑑，進一步深化兩軍務實合作。

title: 美國洛杉磯汽車撞向人群案　疑犯被控涉嫌使用致命武器襲擊他人
news_content:
美國加州洛杉磯東荷里活區有汽車撞向人群，造成30人受傷，當中7人情況危殆，涉案司機亦中槍受傷。

事發在當地星期六凌晨，警方說，疑犯是29歲男子拉米雷斯。當地傳媒報道，他較早時被趕離一間夜總會，之後駕車撞向人群，圍觀者將他拖出車毆打，有人向他開槍，他被送往醫院接受手術。

警方相信拉米雷斯是故意駕車撞人，以涉嫌使用致命武器襲擊他人而拘留控告他。當局亦正搜索開槍打傷拉米雷斯後、徒步逃去的槍手。

被汽車撞傷的人介乎20多至30多歲，部分人不顧勸告已出院。洛杉磯市長形容事件是令人心碎的悲劇，正全面調查。

title: 風暴消息｜深圳灣大橋中午12時15分起封閉
news_content:
深圳市政府口岸辦公室公布，深圳灣公路大橋中午12時15分封閉，恢復通關時間另行公告。

title: 風暴消息｜天文台料十號颶風信號維持至下午3時
風暴消息｜「韋帕」襲港今年首發八號波　十號信號維持至下午初時
news_content:
十號颶風信號現正生效，天文台表示，颱風韋帕正在香港天文台南面約50公里左右掠過，預料十號颶風信號會在下午初時維持。

韋帕於中午12時集結在香港天文台西南偏南約60公里，時速約22公里，橫過香港以南水域。

天文台是於凌晨12時20分發出今年首個八號東北烈風或暴風信號；經過7小時，至今早7時20分改發九號烈風或暴風風力增強信號。2小時後，進一步發出十號颶風信號。

天文台對上一次發出十號颶風信號，為2023年9月的超強颱風「蘇拉」，當時持續逾7小時。

自1946年以來，引致天文台需要發出十號颶風信號的颱風中，包括1999年的颱風「約克」創下生效時間最長紀錄達11小時。2018年的超強颱風「山竹」，當時十號颶風信號持續10小時。

title: 風暴消息｜約500班機取消　港鐵所有露天段列車服務暫停
news_content:
颱風韋帕襲港，海陸空交通大受影響，有大約500班機取消，大約400班航機會重新編配升降時間，涉及約8萬名旅客。機管局預計，中午後可以陸續復飛，今晚及未來一、兩天機場會非常繁忙。

港鐵所有露天段的列車服務已經暫停，隧道段就維持有限度服務，直至另行通知。九巴及龍運、城巴、新大嶼山巴士所有日間路線暫停服務，渡輪亦已停航。

title: 陳美寶冀日後網約車平台財政穩健　審批續牌將考慮投訴等
news_content:
運輸及物流局局長陳美寶表示，政府提出規管網約車平台框架，當局與現時在港的網約車平台公司解釋規管條文，個別一、兩個營業者表示歡迎，支持政府盡快落實框架。

陳美寶在一個電視節目說，營運平台需要屬於香港本地註冊公司，有本地團隊管理監察服務表現和市民意見，也要具營運規模和財力證明，希望平台不會在營運時出現財政不穩，損害市民利益。政府日後審批平台或司機續牌申請時，也會考慮投訴情況等條件。

陳美寶指出，旅客在機場如果需要聯絡非網約服務的士司機，支付車資方面或遇到問題，日後若可以透過科技預先協定路線和車資會更方便。

title: 政府與建造業界推學校STEAM教材　涵蓋建築測量等專業知識
news_content:
發展局局長甯漢豪表示，聯同建造業議會，與建造業界和教育界推出「STEAM UP 想建理」項目，為全港中小學合共1000間學校，製作全港首套以建造業為主題的STEAM學與教材料，涵蓋建築、測量、規劃、園境及工程等範疇，並啟動基建推廣計劃。

發展局發表網誌介紹有關項目，助理秘書長馮鎮江說，至今已有25間中小學試用相關材料，師生反應正面，認為當中的真實工程案例能有效激發學生的學習興趣，令教學事半功倍。

香港建造學院助理院長蔡盈慧指出，材料不僅包括教師教案，還有學生適用的故事書、遊戲及電子學習平台，全方位支援STEAM教學，未來亦將陸續推出8套材料，涵蓋不同專業範疇更多內容，預計於2025/26新學年供全港中小學使用。

蔡盈慧表示，項目亦會邀請工程師、建築師及測量師等專業人士走進課堂，與學生分享實際工程案例，教師也可以學習建造業專業知識，教學相長，進一步提升教學質素。

title: 風暴消息｜杏花邨居民稱「韋帕」威力強勁惟不及「山竹」
news_content:
十號颶風信號現正生效，港島東面的杏花邨橫風橫雨，海面湧起白頭浪，海浪不斷拍打上岸邊。

有附近居民到海旁追風觀浪，認為今次颱風「韋帕」的風力強勁；亦居民說，2018年的超強颱風「山竹」威力更強，當年水浸及膝，今次未有水浸。

另外，在柴灣工業村，有樹木被吹到左搖右擺，有構築物鐵皮被吹至飛脫到行人路上，有燈柱被吹至側向一邊。

天文台提醒，因為海面有極巨浪及湧浪，市民應遠離岸邊及停止所有水上活動 。

title: Typhoon Wipha comes at its closest to Hong Kong
news_content:
The Observatory said the Hurricane Signal No.10 is expected to remain in force early on Sunday afternoon as Typhoon Wipha was at its closest to Hong Kong. 

"Wipha is now skirting about 50 kilometres to the south of the Hong Kong Observatory, posing considerable threat to Hong Kong. Under the influence of its eyewall, hurricane force winds are affecting parts of the territory," said Lee Fung-ying, acting senior scientific officer.  

The Hospital Authority said two males had so far sought medical treatment at the Accident and Emergency Departments of public hospitals during the typhoon. 

As of 10 am, the Government's 1823 Call Centre and the Fire Services Department said they had received a total of 85 reports of fallen trees. 

There have so far been no reports of landslides or flooding.

Earlier, the Home Affairs Department opened 34 temporary shelters with over 200 people seeking refuge.

title: Typhoon Wipha disrupts 400 flights at HK airport
news_content:
Hong Kong International Airport faced further disruption on Sunday as Typhoon Wipha intensified, forcing the Airport Authority to reschedule approximately 400 flights affecting around 80,000 passengers.

As winds associated with the typhoon buffered Hong Kong, the Observatory issued the Hurricane Signal No. 10 at 9.20 am saying it would remain in force for some time. Overnight, the Observatory had issued the Storm Signal No. 8 at 20 minutes past midnight followed by the Increasing Gale Signal No. 9 seven hours later.. 

Chris Au Young, the authority's general manager of terminal and passenger experience, said flights are anticipated to gradually resume from about 1 pm but that passengers should expect an extremely busy airport in the evening.

Au Young told affected travellers to contact their airlines in advance and allow ample time to reach the airport.

"If the No. 8 and No. 9 or higher wind signals continue, we will adjust flight arrangements, and delays will persist. Therefore, we are prepared - providing adequate time and space for passengers to avoid being stranded. We will distribute water, blankets and appropriate food as well," he said.

Highlighting the overnight impact of the typhoon, Au Young said 36 flights carrying over 3,000 passengers had arrived between midnight and 6 am. 

He said operations at the airport remained normal with most arrivals departing via the Airport Express before 6.00 am. 

Au Young said the authority had deployed an additional thousand staff members and made sure that about 800 taxis were available overnight.

title: 越南下龍灣觀光船翻沉增至37死　范明政慰問遇難者家屬
news_content:
越南廣寧省熱門旅遊景點下龍灣觀光船翻沉事故，增至37人死亡，當局仍在搜救5名失蹤者。

當地傳媒報道，涉事觀光船星期六載著48名乘客及5名船員，遊覽下龍灣期間，遇到突如其來的風暴而翻沉。大部分乘客都是從首都河內前來的家庭，當中有20多名兒童。

當局先後救起11人，其中一名獲救的10歲男童表示，自己當時深吸一口氣潛入水中，然後游上來、大聲呼救，一艘載有士兵的船隻將他救起。

總理范明政向遇難者家屬表示慰問，要求國防部和公安部緊急搜救。當局發聲明表示，將查明事故原因，嚴厲處理違法行為。氣象部門說，事故與在南海的熱帶氣旋韋帕無關。

陳茂波：科技園實習生申請破紀錄　多數來自全球排名前50大學
news_content:
財政司司長陳茂波表示，特區政府將人工智能定位為關鍵產業，是看準其未來能廣泛應用在不同產業、場景、產品及服務中，是賦能不同產業升級轉型、提升經濟整體競爭力的核心力量。他認為香港創科產業發展，已經有了一張紮實的藍圖，當局會鎖定目標不放鬆，一張藍圖繪到底。

陳茂波在網誌表示，「人工智能+」已成為近年在全球各地招商引資、吸引特專科企來港上市，以至加速培育本地初創生態圈的重點方向之一，創科將為年青人提供更多元、優質的事業發展機會，讓更多年青人一展抱負、成就夢想。

陳茂波提到，本港在吸引人才方面優勢突出。自2022年底至今，各類人才入境計劃收到約50萬宗申請，當中33萬宗申請獲批，其中有約22萬人已來港。

另外，今年香港科技園的實習計劃收到破紀錄超過5000份申請，最終取錄450人，當中三分二的實習生是來自全球排名前50的學府，包括歐美頂尖的大學，近3成是外籍學生，充分反映香港創科生態圈的國際吸引力。

陳茂波指出，科技創新與青年人才的培育密不可分，教育在當中更是重要，在科技急速更新迭代的時代，人才必須具備敏銳的觸覺和好奇心、快速理解新事物的能力，以及持續學習和研究的拼勁，要有敢於嘗試、勇於創新、不畏失敗的態度和韌力。

title: 風暴消息｜港鐵已暫停所有露天段列車服務　隧道段維持有限度服務
news_content:
十號颶風信號現正生效。港鐵表示，已暫停所有露天段列車服務，開出列車班次不會行駛露天段，輕鐵及港鐵巴士服務已暫停。

title: MTR suspends open-air services leaving some stranded
news_content:
Dozens of commuters were stranded at Kowloon Tong Station on Sunday, after strong winds associated with Typhoon Wipha led the Observatory to issue the Increasing Gale Signal No.9 at 7.20 am before raising it to the maximum No. 10 Hurricane Signal two hours later.

Once the No.9 Signal is issued, MTR train services on exposed and open-air sections are suspended. That includes East Rail Line services to the Lo Wu and Lok Ma Chau border crossings. Underground lines maintain limited operations. 

"I already know that the weather here isn't going to be good, so I didn't plan a longer stay here. Just to stay a couple of days to meet some friends. It's just maybe I am so lucky that I get this severe weather. I haven't come up with an idea yet. It is what it is," said a woman surnamed Wang, who was struggling with her luggage.

A passenger surnamed Lin said she had hit a dead end trying to return to the mainland. As hotel prices soared, she said she was desperate to leave.

"I’m completely overwhelmed. We can’t get back! Our flight was scheduled for this morning but last night we were informed that it would be cancelled. Then we thought we could take the High Speed Rail to Shenzhen instead but those train services are suspended too. We have no choice," she said. 

The Disneyland Resort Line, Airport Express, Light Rail, and all MTR bus services also ceased operations. All morning trips and some of the afternoon trips for High Speed Rail train services between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and the mainland were cancelled or had their departing station changed.

title: 風暴消息｜澳門將於中午12時半改掛十號風球
news_content:
澳門將在早上11時改發九號風球，中午12時半改掛十號風球。

氣象局表示，熱帶氣旋韋帕過去數小時進一步增強，並穩定向偏西移動，按現時預測路徑，稍後將正面吹襲澳門，為澳門帶來顯著影響，伴隨狂風大驟雨及雷暴，對澳門的威脅非常大，風力短時間內會急速增強。

而在八號風球下，大部分店舖都暫停營業，低窪地區部分24小時營業的超市，提早放置水閘暫停營業。但仍有食肆及超市繼續營業，早上有長者或家長帶同小朋友到場食早餐及購物。

設在低窪地區的廣播系統，不時提醒受韋帕影響，風勢稍後會明顯增強，呼籲民眾不要外出盡量留在安全地方。

澳門在清晨6時起，三個連接珠海包括關閘、青茂和珠澳跨境工業區的出入境口岸，已經臨時關閉至另行通知。而在內港低窪區的摩卡角子機場，亦由凌晨4時起暫停營業。

本港競爭力排名重返三甲　丘應樺：海外企業對港充滿信心
news_content:
瑞士洛桑國際管理發展學院的《2025年世界競爭力年報》，香港全球競爭力排名升至全球第三，繼2019年後首次重返三甲。

商務及經濟發展局局長丘應樺在一個電台節目說，特區政府努力將香港整體營商情況扭轉，增強外界對香港的信心，投資推廣署工作超標完成，截至今年上半年已引入1300間企業，有600多間來自其他國家，當中美國排第一，有超過100間，可見面對地緣政治和美國關稅政策，海外企業對香港營商環境仍然很有信心。

他指出，本港5月商品整體出口和進口貨值按年上升，升幅較對上一個月加快，但勢頭要視乎往後中美關稅政策，香港有很多方法尋求新出路，包括鼓勵發展電商貿易，下月將在內地電商平台舉行「香港好物節」，明年計劃在東盟國家舉行，協助香港品牌走出去。

丘應樺提到，美國正與其他國家商討關稅政策，不明朗因素仍然存在，但認為有危也有機，很多國家希望透過香港平台走入大灣區市場，香港也會協助內地企業走出東南亞。他又指，往後會維持歐美國家市場，同時開發東歐、中歐、中亞和拉丁美洲經濟體的市場，正與埃及商討《投資保護協定》，為企業走出去提供更大保障。

丘應樺說，疫情後消費模式改變，零售和餐飲業需要探索創新產品和營商模式適應轉變，吸引消費者，舉例本港珠寶公司與卡通角色合作推出產品，位於尖沙咀的傳統酒樓推出24小時營業，反應理想，電商平台發展也可以協助零售業尋找新出路。

title: Observatory says T10 to remain until early afternoon
news_content:

The Hospital Authority says two males have sought medical treatment at the Accident and Emergency Departments at public hospitals during the typhoon period.

Overnight, the Observatory issued the Storm Signal No. 8 at 20 minutes past midnight before issuing the Increasing Gale Signal No. 9 at 7.20 am.

title: Astronomer CEO resigns after viral Coldplay video
news_content:
The CEO of an American tech company resigned Saturday after a video of him embracing an alleged colleague at a Coldplay concert went viral and fuelled relentless memes.

"Our leaders are expected to set the standard in both conduct and accountability, and recently, that standard was not met," New York-based Astronomer said in a statement shared on LinkedIn.

"Andy Byron has tendered his resignation," the firm said, after previously launching an investigation.

During a Coldplay concert in Foxborough, Massachusetts on Wednesday, the jumbotron zoomed in on a man and a woman embracing in the stands.

But the canoodling pair appeared shocked and horrified when they spotted themselves on the big screen, with the man ducking out of frame and the woman hiding her face.

"Uh-oh, what? Either they're having an affair or they're just very shy," joked Coldplay frontman Chris Martin.

Within hours, internet sleuths tracked down the man as Astronomer CEO Andy Byron and said the woman was the company's chief people officer, Kristin Cabot, alleging that the two were having a not-so-discreet affair.

The video has garnered millions of views on TikTok and other social media, giving rise to memes discussing everything from the folly of having an affair at a Coldplay concert, to the hypocrisy of an HR representative seemingly caught in a workplace relationship.

"The craziest thing is about the Astronomer CEO cheating scandal is it was the HR lady," said one X user. "The person who would warn you against fraternizing with co-workers."

Furry mascots of the Philadelphia Phillies Major League Baseball team jumped on the trend and recreated the scene for the jumbotron at a game after the video went viral.

However an apology statement attributed to Byron which spread rapidly online was fake and appeared to have originated from a parody account. (AFP)

title: Observatory to assess whether T10 needed
news_content:
The Observatory issued the Increasing Gale or Storm Signal No. 9 at 7:20 am on Sunday, adding that it would consider issuing the Signal No. 10 depending on the changes in local winds. 

At 7 am, Typhoon Wipha was about 110 kilometres southeast of Hong Kong. It was forecast to move west or west-northwest at about 25 kilometres per hour, edging closer to the vicinity of the Pearl River Estuary.

According to its current track, Wipha will come as close as 50 kilometres south of the Observatory at around noon. 

Hong Kong is expected to see frequent heavy squally showers and thunderstorms throughout Sunday, the Observatory added. 

Members of the public are also urged to stay away from the shoreline and not to engage in water sports as seas will be high with swells.

Classes of all day schools and child care centres would be suspended on Sunday, the Education Bureau said.

The Immigration Department also announced that there are no services at all Births, Deaths and Marriage Registries while Signal No. 8 or above is in force.

Meanwhile, the Hospital Authority said accident and emergency services at public hospitals would maintain normal service - while outpatient services were suspended.

title: MTR to offer limited services amid typhoon
news_content:
Public transport operators on Sunday said they will suspend their services, or run them on a limited basis, due to Typhoon Wipha.

The MTR said it would offer limited railway services and that services on open sections of the railway and light rail would be suspended when the No. 9 Signal is in force. The Observatory has said the No. 9 Signal will be issued at 7:20 am.

The Tsuen Wan Line, Kwun Tong Line, Island Line, South Island Line, Tung Chung Line, Airport Express, and Tuen Ma Line are running at 10-minute intervals.

The Tsung Kwan O Line is operating every 10 to 15 minutes, and the East Rail Line every 10 to 20 minutes.   

Meanwhile, KMB, Citybus and Long Win Bus have announced the suspension of all daytime routes until further notice. 

Ferry services, including the Star Ferry and outlying islands ferries, are suspended.

For cross-boundary travel, the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge has been closed since 3:30 am, while the shuttle service between Lok Ma Chau and Huanggang ports continues to operate but with limited services.

All morning, and some of the afternoon, high-speed rail services between Hong Kong and the mainland have been cancelled.

title: 澤連斯基：烏方已向俄方提議本周舉行新一輪和談
news_content:
烏克蘭總統澤連斯基表示，烏方已經向俄羅斯提議舉行新一輪和談，他希望加快停火談判進程。

澤連斯基發表全國演說時說，國家安全與國防委員會秘書烏梅羅夫已經向俄方提議本周舉行新一輪會談。澤連斯基強調，應該盡一切努力實現停火，俄方不應該再迴避任何決定。

他又說，與俄方關於交換戰俘的談判仍然繼續，烏克蘭繼續履行上次在土耳其伊斯坦布爾會議達成的協議，目前團隊正籌備另一輪交換。

title: 風暴消息｜尖沙咀碼頭有市民稱風勢不算強烈　有遊客稱行程受影響
news_content:
八號東北烈風或暴風信號生效。

午夜時分，尖沙咀碼頭一帶有個別市民在海旁聊天，表示風勢不算強烈，但當風勢漸大就會到安全地方躲避；亦有無家者在海旁的長櫈睡覺。

有內地旅客說，晚上出來看看颱風下的維港夜景，今次行程受到颱風影響，若交通情況許可星期日就會返回深圳，下次再來港。

在港島東面的杏花邨，海面不時出現白頭浪，雨勢時大時小，未見有人「追風」。

title: 越南下龍灣觀光船翻沉增至36死
news_content:
越南廣寧省下龍灣觀光船翻沉事故，增至36人死亡。

事發在昨日下午1時許，當地傳媒報道，這艘載有48名遊客和5名船員的觀光船，遇到突如其來的風暴而翻沉，有關部門隨即部署救援工作，救起多人，到今日凌晨開始將觀光船扶正，期間發現遺體。

氣象部門說，下龍灣的暴雨與風暴韋帕無關。

總理范明政簽發緊急通知，要求迅速展開搜救，全力做好善後。

title: 風暴消息｜韋帕靠近料天氣持續惡劣　天文台評估需否改發更高信號
news_content:
八號東北烈風或暴風信號現正生效，預料日間大部分時間維持。天文台表示，颱風韋帕移近廣東沿岸，隨著韋帕靠近，預料日間天氣持續惡劣。

天文台會視乎韋帕與香港的距離及本地風力變化，評估是否需要在今早改發更高熱帶氣旋警告信號。

title: 洛杉磯有汽車撞向人群30傷　司機被人拖出襲擊及開槍射擊
news_content:
美國加州洛杉磯東荷里活區有汽車撞向人群，造成30人受傷，當中7人危殆，涉事司機中槍受傷，警方正調查事件。

事發在當地星期六凌晨2時左右，現場照片顯示，一輛灰色汽車停在行人路，碎片散滿一地。警方說，涉事汽車撞到一個攤檔及一個代客泊車座台後，衝向在一間夜總會門外排隊的人群，當時排隊的大多數是女性。

傳媒引述目擊者表示，出事前有人被夜總會的人驅逐，這個人之後駕車衝向人群，圍觀者之後將司機拖出並毆打，亦有人向司機開槍。

警方說，中槍的司機已被送院，懷疑開槍的西班牙裔男子，可能有一把銀色左輪手槍。

title: 風暴消息｜九巴及龍運所有通宵路線已暫停服務
news_content:
九巴表示，八號東北烈風或暴風信號正生效，九巴及龍運所有通宵路線暫停服務。

至於日間服務，除了九巴路線B1、B9及龍運路線S1、S64、S64C、S64P、S64X由頭班車起維持有限度服務外，九巴及龍運其餘日間路線暫停服務，直至另行通知。

title: 特朗普重申伊朗的三處核設施都已被完全摧毀
news_content:
美國總統特朗普重申，伊朗的三處核設施都已經被完全摧毀。

美軍上月空襲伊朗境內三處核設施，打擊成效存在爭議。特朗普星期六在社交平台發文，強調三處核設施都已被完全摧毀，或被徹底清除，要讓它們恢復運作需要幾年，如果伊朗有意重建相關能力，選擇三個全新地點重新開始會更好。

美國全國廣播公司日前報道，最新評估顯示伊朗只有一處核設施被嚴重摧毀。另外兩處核設施的損壞程度沒有那麼嚴重，如果伊朗願意，可以在幾個月內恢復鈾濃縮。

title: 風暴消息｜馬會場外投注處電話投注及顧客服務熱線暫停服務
news_content:
天文台表示，八號信號將於日間大部分時間會維持，馬會表示，今日場外投注處、電話投注及顧客服務熱線包括1818、1817和1880將不會提供服務。

馬會提醒顧客可透過數碼平台，包括網上投注服務「投注區」、馬會投注三合一及Racing Touch應用程式，或1886電話投注自動服務系統投注。

馬會會密切留意實際情況，審視服務安排，顧客可到馬會網站瀏覽最新消息。

title: 風暴消息｜韋帕穩定靠近廣東沿岸　天文台將評估需否改發更高信號
news_content:
八號東北烈風或暴風信號生效，日間大部分時間將維持，颱風韋帕穩定地靠近廣東沿岸，外圍雨帶正影響珠江口一帶，本港風勢將會增強，有頻密狂風大驟雨及雷暴。

按照現時預測路徑，韋帕會在今早頗為接近珠江口一帶，在香港天文台以南約50公里左右掠過，天文台會視乎韋帕與香港的距離及本地風力變化，評估是否需要在今早改發更高熱帶氣旋警告信號。

title: 風暴消息｜上環港澳客運碼頭及尖沙咀中國客運碼頭暫時關閉
news_content: 八號熱帶氣旋警告信號生效，海事處宣布，上環港澳客運碼頭及尖沙咀中國客運碼頭，已經暫時關閉。

title: 風暴消息｜澳門將於凌晨4時改掛八號風球　特首落區視察
news_content:
澳門將於凌晨4時改掛八號東北風球。氣象局在昨晚11時將風暴潮警告由藍色改為黄色，表示低漥地區可能出現水浸的水位高度，會介乎0.5至1米之間。

入夜後，澳門風力未算太大，偶然有大驟雨，不少旅客傍晚開始陸續趁天氣未轉壞前過關。

行政長官岑浩輝和三名司長等，昨日下午到內港低窪地區視察，了解區內剛完成的兩個防洪水泵設施運作，以及區內居民應對颱風的情況，並指示各部門共同做好防風防水浸工作。

title: 風暴消息｜港鐵輕鐵正常服務至收車　機鐵凌晨加開四班接載旅客
news_content:
八號東北烈風或暴風信號現正生效。港鐵列車、輕鐵及港鐵巴士將維持正常服務，直至晚上收車。

為接載抵港旅客及乘客前往市區，港鐵公司將延長機場快綫服務，今日凌晨增加四班由機場站開出前往香港站的班次，開出時間分別為：1時15分、1時45分、2時15分及2時45分。由於屆時其他鐵路綫的列車服務已結束，港鐵公司提醒乘搭機場快綫加開班次的乘客，預先計劃到達市區後的接駁交通。

在颱風期間，港鐵會在安全的情況下盡量維持服務，若天氣情況突然轉差，港鐵露天段列車、輕鐵及港鐵巴士可能在未有預先通知的情況下暫停。

高速鐵路（香港段）方面，港鐵會繼續與內地鐵路單位就兩地的天氣情況協調相應的列車服務安排，列車服務可能會因為天氣情況惡劣而在短時間內暫停。當天文台發出十號颶風信號，高鐵會暫停服務。

另外，為保障乘客和人員的安全，九號烈風或暴風風力增強信號（或更高颱風信號）生效期間，港鐵列車班次均不會行駛露天段，輕鐵亦會暫停服務。

若天文台發出九號或更高信號時，已經在露天段行駛中的列車會盡可能在安全情況下，行駛至原定的終點站或有連接商場的車站等相對安全的地方。

title: 李強在西藏調研　出席雅魯藏布江下游水電工程開工儀式
news_content:
中共中央政治局常委、國務院總理李強近日在西藏調研，強調要深入貫徹中共總書記習近平關於西藏工作的重要論述和新時代黨的治藏方略，堅持生態保護優先，高質量實施國家重大工程項目，因地制宜培育特色優勢產業，持續推動經濟社會發展，不斷增進各族人民福祉。

李強昨日早上出席在林芝市米林水電站壩址舉行的雅魯藏布江下游水電工程開工儀式，宣布工程正式開工。

他強調，雅下水電工程體量大、周期長、影響遠，堪稱世紀工程，要積極應用先進技術、裝備、工藝、材料等，為高質量建設提供有力支撐，並引領相關領域科技創新和產業創新。

他又說，要格外重視生態保護，確保生態環境不受損害，要細緻做好移民搬遷安置工作，把推進工程建設和促進當地民眾就業增收，更好結合起來。

雅魯藏布江下游水電工程主要採取截彎取直、隧洞引水的開發方式，建設5座梯級電站，總投資約1.2萬億元人民幣，工程電力以外送消納為主，兼顧西藏本地自用需求。

title: 風暴消息｜八號信號日間大部分時間維持　評估需否改發更高信號
news_content:
天文台在凌晨12時20分發出今年首個八號東北烈風或暴風信號，並將於今日日間大部分時間維持。

news_content:
天文台發出八號熱帶氣旋警告信號，城巴表示，所有路線於凌晨2時20分起陸續暫停服務，將密切留意颱風動向及路面狀況公佈服務安排。

title: 風暴消息｜康文署轄下所有刊憲泳灘暫時封閉　違者可判罰款及監禁
news_content:
八號熱帶氣旋警告信號現正生效。康文署宣布，轄下所有刊憲泳灘暫時封閉；根據相關規例，任何人若不遵從有關安排即屬違法，一經定罪，最高可被判罰款2000元及監禁14天。

署方提醒，惡劣天氣下市民應遠離岸邊，切勿前往泳灘進行水上活動，以免危及個人及救援人員安全。

news_content: 天星小輪表示，受颱風韋帕影響，來往中環至尖沙咀渡輪服務將於早上6時30分起停航，來往中環至灣仔渡輪早上7時30分起停航。

news_content:

news_content:

title: 日本今日舉行國會參議院選舉　執政聯盟或失去過半數議席
news_content:
日本今日舉行國會參議院選舉，民調顯示執政聯盟可能失去過半數議席。

參議院共有248個議席，每三年改選一半，今次改選124個議席和一個補選議席，身兼自民黨總裁的首相石破茂爭取執政聯盟在選舉後維持過半數議席，目前自民黨和夥伴公明黨在非改選議席共有75席，意味兩黨在今次選舉需要拿下至少50席。

不過《讀賣新聞》預測，自民黨最終可能只是收獲30多個議席，即使加上公明黨的議席亦難以過半。《朝日新聞》和《日本經濟新聞》就認為，執政聯盟要贏得50席是極為困難。

執政聯盟在去年10月的國會眾議院選舉中，未能獲得過半數議席，淪為少數派政府。有分析認為，如果參議院選舉再次失利，石破茂的執政之路將會更困難，亦可能動搖投資者對日本的信心，並擾亂日本與美國的貿易談判。

外界亦關注在野黨在今次選舉的表現，其中主張日本人優先的民粹保守政黨參政黨，有望取得雙位數議席，有分析認為，如果參政黨成為日本政壇關鍵少數，日本政治或將會進一步保守化和右傾化。

title: T8 signal to remain in force most of Sunday
news_content:
The Observatory issued the Number 8 Northeast Gale or Storm Signal at 12:20am on Sunday, as Severe Tropical Storm Wipha intensified into a typhoon and edged closer to Hong Kong.

The Number 8 Signal is expected to remain in force for most of the day.

At 1am, Wipha was about 250km east-southeast of Hong Kong. It was forecast to move west or west-northwest at about 25km per hour towards coastal Guangdong, skirting at about 50km south of the Observatory.

"Depending on the distance between Wipha and Hong Kong, and the change in local wind condition, the Observatory will assess the need for issuing higher tropical cyclone warning signals Sunday morning," senior scientific officer Lee Shuk-ming said. 

Members of the public have been urged to pay attention to the latest weather information from the Observatory and complete all precautionary measures as soon as possible.

KMB and Citybus said overnight services would be suspended from 2am onwards.

The MTR announced it would arrange four extra departures for the Airport Express at 1:15am, 1:45am, 2:15am, and 2:45am to take passengers to the city.

In terms of cross-boundary travel, the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macau Bridge will close at 3:30am, while shuttle buses between Lok Ma Chau and Huanggang Port will continue to provide limited service.

Classes of all day schools and child care centres will be suspended on Sunday, the Education Bureau said. 

The Trade Development Council said the ongoing Book Fair, Sports and Leisure Expo, and World of Snacks in Wan Chai will be suspended. If the Number 8 signal is lowered at or before 4:30pm, the fairs will reopen within two hours.

title: 風暴消息｜陳國基稱政府嚴陣以待　全力減輕惡劣天氣帶來威脅影響
news_content:
政務司司長陳國基表示，隨著「韋帕」逐漸逼近本港，保安局轄下的緊急事故監察及支援中心已投入運作，各相關工務部門派出首長級人員進駐中心當值，務求在颱風期間更迅速協調應變，以保障市民安全為首要任務。

陳國基到中心視察並聽取匯報，他在社交網頁表示，政府嚴陣以待做好應對準備，全力減輕惡劣天氣帶來的威脅及影響，盡力保障市民的生命財產及公共安全。各部門已做好不同善後部署，安排好人手、裝備，在颱風過後盡快讓市面復常。

他指出，渠務署合共最多180隊緊急應變隊伍已準備就緒，會於各區及時清渠；因應風暴潮可令大埔滘海平面上升，已於合適位置放置臨時擋水壩及排水水泵。路政署聯同承辦商備妥人手裝備隨時候命，處理塌樹及障礙物。民政事務總署已聯同關愛隊提醒市民加強防備，各區臨時庇護中心亦已提早開放。運輸署與公共交通營辦商會緊密協調，務求在風暴過後盡快恢復正常服務。

陳國基說，天文台預計「韋帕」在星期日會頗為接近珠江口一帶，日間天氣會持續惡劣；教育局已提早宣布所有日校星期日停課。他又說，天文台會視乎「韋帕」與香港的距離、會否進一步增強為颱風及本地風力變化，評估星期日早上是否需要改發更高熱帶氣旋警告信號。

陳國基呼籲市民絕不可進行追風逐浪等危及安全的活動，務必提高警覺，做好防風措施，避免前往岸邊或危險。

title: 風暴消息｜韋帕已增強為颱風　天文台將改發八號烈風或暴風信號
news_content:
三號強風信號生效，強烈熱帶風暴韋帕已增強為颱風，天文台將於午夜12時20分改發八號烈風或暴風信號，預料本港風勢將會增強。

天文台說，韋帕會在星期日頗為接近珠江口一帶，預料日間天氣持續惡劣，天文台會視乎韋帕與香港的距離及本地風力變化，評估星期日早上是否需要改發更高熱帶氣旋警告信號。

title: 風暴消息｜山頂纜車凌霄閣摩天台於八號或以上信號期間暫停開放
news_content:
山頂纜車公司表示，因應天文台將於凌晨12時20分改發八號烈風或暴風信號，山頂纜車、凌霄閣及摩天台將暫停開放，直至八號或以上警告信號取消。

若八號或以上警告信號於當日下午6時或之前取消，有關設施目標在3小時內恢復開放，否則將不會於當日重開。

title: 風暴消息｜啟德體育園所有場地設施八號信號期間關閉
news_content:
啟德體育園表示，因應天文台將於凌晨12時20分發出八號熱帶氣旋警告信號，體育園所有場地設施將會關閉，並會視乎實際情況於日間風暴信號下調後2小時內陸續重開。

若八號或以上警告信號於下午5時仍然生效，所有設施當天將維持關閉。

園方又表示，已預訂設施的「啟德體育園之友」，可在網上系統的預訂紀錄中領取電子現金券，並在限期內重新租用，或者重新預訂10日內可供使用的設施。

title: 風暴消息｜勞工處提醒僱主僱員預先訂好上下班復工及遙距工作安排
news_content:
天文台表示，將於星期日凌晨12時20分，改發八號烈風或暴風信號。勞工處提醒僱主，應與員工訂好在熱帶氣旋、暴雨警告及極端情況下，以及其後的工作安排，包括上班、下班、復工及遙距工作等。

勞工處發言人表示，在擬訂及執行有關安排時，除了考慮機構運作需要等因素，僱主應優先考慮僱員的安全和從居住地點往返工作地點的可行性等，亦應盡量體諒個別僱員可能面對的路面和交通等情況，並考慮他們的實際困難和需要，採納情理兼備及具彈性的處理方法，例如容許返回工作崗位有困難的僱員遙距工作，或者給予較寬裕的上班和復工時間。
　　 
勞工處指出，如政府作出極端情況公布，除已與僱主訂立返回工作地點協定的人員外，僱員應留在原來的地點或安全地點，不要啓程上班；已在工作地點當值的僱員，在安全情況下可如常工作；如工作地點有危險，在可行及安全的情況下，僱主應安排僱員提早下班或到安全的地方暫避；如必須安排僱員在惡劣天氣及極端情況下返回工作地點當值，僱主應就他們的交通、安全、膳食、休息地點等作好安排。

title: 越南下龍灣翻船增至27人死亡
news_content:
越南下龍灣一艘載著53人的遊船翻沉，增至27人死亡，死者包括多名兒童，仍然有多人失蹤。

當地傳媒報道，船上有48名遊客，大部分來自首都河內，另外有5名船員。遊船下午一時許在下龍灣桃果洞附近海域遇到狂風雷暴，期間因為大風上下翻轉。廣寧省邊防部隊救起十多人，其中一人是14歲男童，他被困船內4小時。

當地氣象部門指，下龍灣的暴雨與風暴「韋帕」無關。

news_content:
天文台將於凌晨12時20分，改發八號烈風或暴風信號。

news_content: 考評局宣佈，由於天氣惡劣，明日澳洲聯邦舞蹈教師協會（香港區）考試將會改期；明日上午舉行的GRE iBT考試將會取消。有關安排將另行公布。

title: Data of 419,000 Louis Vuitton customers in HK leaked
news_content:
The data of around 420,000 Hong Kong customers of Louis Vuitton were leaked from a breach, the city's privacy watchdog confirmed on Saturday.

The Office of the Privacy Commissioner for Personal Data (PCPD) said while the data breach took place in June, it was only notified on Thursday, more than two weeks after the French luxury fashion house's SAR office was made aware of the incident.

"An investigation has been launched against LVHK (Louis Vuitton Hong Kong) in accordance with established procedures, including whether there was delayed reporting of the incident," the PCPD said in a statement.

No complaints or enquiries were received so far, it added.

The office said the data leaked included customers' names, passport numbers, dates of birth, addresses, email addresses phone numbers, transaction records and product preferences.

The breach was first detected by Louis Vuitton's global headquarters on June 13. LVHK was then notified of the incident on July 2.

The PCPD urged companies to report data breaches as soon as possible, so remedial measures can be taken to minimise the damage to affected parties.

news_content: 天文台「預警八號特別告示」，將於7月20日凌晨12時20分發出八號熱帶氣旋警告信號，本港風勢將會增強。

title: 中國駐越南大使何煒：有信心香港推動中越合作方面發揮橋頭堡作用
news_content:
中國駐越南大使何煒表示，越南多個行業正在「爆發式發展」，香港作為國際金融中心和貿易中心，服務業專業，可推動雙方更高層次合作。去年香港特區行政長官曾到越南訪問，效果非常好，他對未來很有信心，相信香港可以在中越合作，包括和東盟，中國和東盟合作方面，發揮橋頭堡作用，能夠推動我們更多更好的行業，達致高品質發展。

何煒昨日出席慶祝中越建交75周年的音樂活動時，接受本台以及廣西廣播電視台訪問。他認為，活動以音樂形式建立了兩國友誼之橋，推動了兩國人民之間的「心相通」，有關活動已持續20年，已成為金字招牌，希望能繼續推動發展下去。

title: 盧拉批評美國對巴西法官實施簽證限制是武斷和毫無根據
news_content:
巴西總統盧拉批評美國對巴西法官實施簽證限制是武斷，而且毫無根據，違反國家互相尊重主權的基本原則。

他在一份聲明表示，堅信來自任何人和形式的恐嚇或威脅，都不會損害巴西權力和機構最重要的使命，就是永遠捍衛和維護民主法治。

巴西聯邦最高法院一名法官頒令，對被控策劃政變的前總統博爾索納羅採取限制措施，包括禁止聯絡外國官員，並需要戴上電子腳鐐。

博爾索納羅批評是極大羞辱。美國亦作出聲援，國務卿魯比奧宣布撤銷有關法官及其直系親屬等人的美國簽證。

title: 風暴消息｜九巴及龍運巴士通宵路線凌晨2時起陸續暫停服務
news_content:
天文台將於凌晨12時20分改發八號烈風或暴風信號。

九巴及龍運巴士的所有通宵路線將於凌晨2時正起，陸續暫停服務；所有日間路線就會維持服務至尾班車時間。

title: 風暴消息｜機場快綫凌晨延長服務加開4班由機場站開出班次
news_content:
港鐵表示，為接載抵港旅客及乘客前往市區，機場快綫凌晨將延長服務，加開4班次由機場站開出的班次。

由機場站開出的新增班次，開車時間分別是凌晨1時15分、1時45分、2時15分及2時45分，即大約半小時一班車；加開的班次會途經青衣站、九龍站、並以香港站為終點站。

港鐵表示，由於届時其他鐵路綫的列車服務已結束，提醒乘搭機場快綫加開班次的乘客，預先計劃到達市區後的接駁交通。

至於由香港站往機場/博覽館方向的機場快綫服務，則維持正常，尾班車於凌晨12 時48分開出。

title: 風暴消息｜城巴料明日頭班車起至中午前大部分路線暫停服務
news_content:
天文台將於星期日凌晨12時20分發出八號熱帶氣旋警告信號，城巴宣布，所有日間路線維持服務直至尾班車，通宵路線將於星期日凌晨2時20分起陸續暫停。

城巴預計星期日由頭班車起至中午前，除個別連接口岸及機場路線維持有限度服務外，大部分路線將不提供服務，公司將密切留意颱風動向及路面狀況公布服務安排。

title: 洛城汽車撞人群　消防說傷者多數是女性　正排隊進入夜總會
news_content:
美國洛杉磯發生汽車衝入人群事件，至少28人受傷，當中最少9人重傷。

洛杉磯消防局說，事發在當地星期六凌晨接近二時，一架汽車在聖莫尼卡大道衝入人群。

當局暫時未公布事故原因或司機身份的詳細資料。

美聯社引述消防部門說，傷者大部分是女性，她們當時在一間夜總會門外排隊進入。救護人員發現其中一名病者身上有槍傷，目前不知道這人的身份。

title: 中央氣象局預計韋帕周日登陸粵瓊沿海　發布颱風橙色預警
news_content:
中央氣象局表示，預計韋帕星期日登陸粵瓊沿海，已升級發布颱風橙色預警。

中央氣象台預計韋帕強度繼續加強，向廣東珠海到海南文昌一帶沿海靠近，並於星期日下午至晚間在上述沿海登陸，之後穿過雷州半島，星期一日間移入北部灣海面，隨後趨向越南北部沿海。預計韋帕將為華南沿海帶來明顯大風和降雨。

title: T8 signal to go up at 12:20am on Sunday
news_content:
The Observatory says it will issue the Gale or Storm Signal Number 8 at 20 minutes past midnight on Sunday, as Severe Tropical Storm Wipha edges closer to the region.

At 9pm, Wipha was about 370km east-southeast of Hong Kong. It was forecast to move west-northwest at about 25km per hour towards the coast of Guangdong, and come "rather close to the vicinity of the Pearl River Estuary".

Local winds were expected to reach gale to storm force on Sunday, with frequent heavy squally showers and thunderstorms, the Observatory added.

It will assess the need of issuing higher tropical cyclone warning signals on Sunday morning.

Members of the public have been urged to pay attention to the latest weather information from the Observatory and complete all precautionary measures as soon as possible.

Flooding may occur in low-lying coastal areas as a result of a storm surge, and people have been advised to stay away from the shoreline and not to engage in water sports.

title: 風暴消息｜港鐵列車輕鐵及港鐵巴士服務維持正常班次直至晚上收車
news_content:
天文台將於凌晨12時20分改發八號烈風或暴風信號，港鐵表示，重鐵列車、輕鐵及港鐵巴士服務將維持正常班次，直至晚上收車。

颱風期間，所有車站會盡量維持開放。
